TopicTitle: If the Moon were one pixel...

Articles.Content: This is why KSP is small scale in reality. Enjoy!

I made it. I made it all the way to the end. I've seen things... things you wouldn't believe. Things that would make a guy mad... sentences... in the middle of space... mad...

Thanks for making my mind grind to a halt again. I've seen all these scale things and my head tries to comprehend the distances. Don't do that, it hurts
To get to Alpha Centurai, you would have to add 6800+ Sun to Pluto maps end to end... Kinda makes you feel small.

I like!

Here is a link to my all time favorite "you are a dust mote on the eye of the universe" perceptive scales, just use your mousewheel to scroll.

http://www.htwins.net/scale2/
this is why i like space. (i have a wired thing for large scales.)
Me too! I have a large space between my ears...
When how realize how big everything is, you become quite humble.
